H0.text: Comets are most affected by the pull of gravity from Earth.

H1.text: The Sun is the object on which Earth's gravity has the greatest effect.

H2.text: Asteroids are most affected by Earth's gravitational pull.

H3.text: The Moon is the celestial body on which Earth's gravitational pull has the greatest effect.

A4.text: The strongest gravitational pull on the Moon is towards the Sun, more than twice that towards Earth.
